verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. The YY <S%H3068><s%> is my shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; I shall not want <S%H2637><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
He maketh me to lie down <S%H7257><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in green <S%H1877><s%> pastures <S%H4999><s%>: he leadeth <S%H5095><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me beside the still <S%H4496><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>.
He restoreth <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8787><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>: he leadeth <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me in the paths <S%H4570><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%> for his name's <S%H8034><s%> sake.

Yea, though I walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> through the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>, I will fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no evil <S%H7451><s%>: for thou art with me; thy rod <S%H7626><s%> and thy staff <S%H4938><s%> they comfort <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me.

Thou preparest <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me in the presence of mine enemies <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: thou anointest <S%H1878><s%> <S%H8765><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>; my cup <S%H3563><s%> runneth over <S%H7310><s%>.

Surely goodness <S%H2896><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> shall follow <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me all the days <S%H3117><s%> of my life <S%H2416><s%>: and I will dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> for ever <S%H753><s%> <S%H3117><s%>.
